name: service-listed
objective: Check pre-defined services
description: We want to make sure all popular IM services are available
pre_condition: First launch / no account created

steps.expected: IM application is launched
All services are listed: Facebook Chat, Google Talk, Jabber, Yahoo!, AIM, Twitter, Skype, QQ

author: sdx

name: Facebook-account-signin
objective: Create a new account and sign in - Facebook
description: We want to make sure we can create an account and sign in
pre_condition:
Registered to Facebook service
- Connected to network

steps.expected: Image of the service is displayed with fields name/Id and password
Account is created
"Loading contacts" progress is shown (or similar progress). Contact list is displayed

author: sdx

name: Facebook-add-contact
objective: Add a contactB - Facebook
description: We want to make sure we can add a contact
pre_condition:
Registered to Facebook service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in
UserB is registered to Facebook service
- ContactB is not added in the contact list
- UserB is logged in using a clientB

steps.description: Add contactB in the buddy list

steps.expected: buddyB's status is displayed in the contact list. ClientB displays my presence

author: sdx

name: Facebook-instant-message
objective: Send and receive a message to/from contactB - Facebook
description: We want to make sure we can send and receive a message to/from contactB
pre_condition:
Registered to Facebook service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in as UserA
- UserB is registered to Facebook service
- ContactB is added in the contact list of UserA
- UserB is logged in using a clientB
- ContactA is added in the contact list of UserB

steps.expected: Message is received by clientB

steps.description: On clientB, send a message to e.g. buddyA
steps.expected: Message from userB is received and displayed

author: sdx

name: Facebook-share-presence
objective: Share presences with contactB - Facebook
description: We want to make sure we can update presence and see contacts' presence
pre_condition:
Registered to Facebook service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in as UserA
- UserB is registered to Facebook service
- ContactB is added in the contact list of UserA
- UserB is logged in using a clientB
- ContactA is added in the contact list of UserB

steps.description: On clientB, update the presence with a new value
On device check the presence of buddyB
steps.expected: On device, new presence status of contactB is well displayed

steps.description: On device, update the presence with a new value
On clientB, check the presence of buddyA
steps.expected: On clientB, the new presence status of buddyA is well displayed

author: sdx

name: GTalk-account-signin
objective: Create a new account and sign in - GTalk
description: We want to make sure we can create an account and sign in
pre_condition:
Registered to Google Talk service
- Connected to network

steps.description: In account list, tap Google Talk
steps.expected: Image of the service is displayed with fields name/Id and password
Account is created
"Loading contacts" progress is shown (or similar progress). Contact list is displayed

author: sdx

name: GTalk-add-contact
objective: Add a contactB - Gtalk
description: We want to make sure we can add a contact
pre_condition:
Registered to Google Talk service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in
UserB is registered to Google Talk service
- ContactB is not added in the contact list
- UserB is logged in using a clientB

steps.description: Add contactB in the buddy list

steps.expected: buddyB's status is displayed in the contact list. ClientB displays my presence

author: sdx

name: GTalk-instant-message
objective: Send and receive a message to/from contactB - Gtalk
description: We want to make sure we can send and receive a message to/from contactB
pre_condition:
Registered to Google Talk service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in as UserA
- UserB is registered to Google Talk service
- ContactB is added in the contact list of UserA
- UserB is logged in using a clientB
- ContactA is added in the contact list of UserB

steps.expected: Message is received by clientB

steps.description: On clientB, send a message to e.g. buddyA
steps.expected: Message from userB is received and displayed

author: sdx

name: GTalk-share-presence
objective: Share presences with contactB - Gtalk
description: We want to make sure we can update presence and see contacts' presence
pre_condition:
Registered to Google Talk service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in as UserA
- UserB is registered to Google Talk service
- ContactB is added in the contact list of UserA
- UserB is logged in using a clientB
- ContactA is added in the contact list of UserB

steps.description: On clientB, update the presence with a new value
On device check the presence of buddyB
steps.expected: On device, new presence status of contactB is well displayed

steps.description: On device, update the presence with a new value
On clientB, check the presence of buddyA
steps.expected: On clientB, the new presence status of buddyA is well displayed

author: sdx

name: GTalk-voip
objective: Start and end a VoIP video call - GTalk
description: We want to make sure we can start a VOIP video call while connected to Facebook service
pre_condition:
Registered to Google Talk service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in as UserA
- UserB is registered to Google Talk service
- ContactB is added in the contact list of UserA
- UserB is logged in using a clientB
- ContactA is added in the contact list of UserB

steps.description: On device, open a chat with contactB

steps.expected: Button allows to start a VoIP video call with contactB. Call status shows "Calling..."

steps.description: Accept the video call on clientB
steps.expected: Video status shows "Connecting ...". A video of the contact is shown and own video in a miniature
Buttons allow to end the video call, pause the video, mute/unmute audio, increase/decrease volume
A counter shows the duration of the video call
Video window is closed. Call counter indicates the duration of the video call. Buttons are greyed out and become available again. Conversation with contactB is displayed

Buttons allow to end the video call, pause the video, mute/unmute audio, increase/decrease volume

name: Twitter-elect-contact
objective: Elect to receive tweets from users that you follow
description: We want to make sure we can elect to receive tweets from users that you follow
pre_condition:
Registered to Twitter service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in
UserB is registered to Twitter service
- ContactB is not added in the contact list
- UserB is logged in using a clientB

steps.description: Elect to receive tweets from userB
steps.expected: UserB is elected

author: sdx

name: Twitter-tweet-message
objective: Create Twitter message and send it to Twitter and receive a tweet from a user that you follow
description: We want to make sure we can send a Twitter message direct to Twitter and receive a tweet from a user that you follow
pre_condition:
Registered to Twitter service
- Connected to network
- A valid account created
- Signed in as UserA
- UserB is registered to Twitter service
- ContactB is elected to receive tweets
- UserB is logged in in Twitter

steps.description: Open https://twitter.com/ from any Browser and login
Send a Twitter message from IM application
steps.expected: Message is received by Twitter

steps.description: UserB post a new Twitter message
steps.expected: Message Tweet is received in IM application
